Classes in gov.anl.ipns.MathTools.Geometry used by gov.anl.ipns.MathTools.Geometry
Position3D
          Position3D represents a position in 3D space in cartesian, cylindrical and spherical coordinate systems.
Position3D_d
          Position3D_d represents a double precision position in 3D space in cartesian, cylindrical and spherical coordinate systems.
Tran3D
          This class represents basic transformations of Vector3D objects, such as translation, rotation, scaling, 3D viewing & projection, as well as arbitrary 4x4 linear transformations.
Tran3D_d
          This class represents basic transformations of Vector3D_d objects, such as translation, rotation, scaling, 3D viewing & projection, as well as arbitrary 4x4 linear transformations, using double precision.
Vector3D
          This class represents a 3D vector using 4D homogeneous coordinates for use with the Tran3D class.
Vector3D_d
          This class represents a double precision 3D vector using 4D homogeneous coordinates for use with the Tran3D_d class.
